A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Full\, active\, in intriguing\, and very emotional. This movie spices the series\, and introduces a lot of new things. Although it's a long movie\, it shines brightly with it's emotional actions. Sacrifices and deaths make this movie make this movie breathtakingly sad. I rate this movie a four because I loved it so much\, but it's extremely long and also I expected a lot more. After waiting for about 2 years\, I finally watch it and not much is really shown. I expect a lot more to be revealed and I have to wait 2 more years for the next movie. I still really appreciate this movie for it's action\, emotion\, and astonishing and compelling impact on the whole series.
